name: SNEKK (4KbShort)
description:
A Snake clone made in LOVE2D 10.02 on Lubuntu 20.04 for the Linux Game Jam 2022.

Controls: WASD to move, eat "@" and avoid your tail "#".

To play the .love file you must have some version of LOVE2D installed. If you'd like to see the source code just open the .love file as a zip and extract the contents.
